name: Panamedia International Flight School
about: Panamedia International Flight School is a premier institution for professional pilot training, located in Mallorca and Valencia, Spain. We offer high-quality theoretical and practical training tailored to airline requirements. Our programs include Private Pilot Licence (PPL), Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL), and Flight Instructor training. The school is equipped with an Airbus A320 simulator for Multi-Crew Cooperation (MCC) training, ensuring our students receive comprehensive and industry-relevant education. With a strong focus on excellence, Panamedia International Flight School prepares its students to meet the highest standards in aviation, providing them with the skills and knowledge necessary for a successful career in the aviation industry.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Flight Instructor - Multi-Engine (MEI)
Multi-Crew Cooperation Course (MCC)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating
EASA ATPL Ground School"]
